mapper.select: SELECT couponNum, coupon, TO_CHAR(startDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') startDate, TO_CHAR(endDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') endDate FROM coupon WHERE ( TO_DATE(startDate) >= SYSDATE + 1) ORDER BY couponNum DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO myCoupon (userId, couponNum, useCoupon) VALUES (#{userId}, #{couponNum}, #{useCoupon})
